title: (x) Supeomes serif italic with peculiar 'p' - FF Disturbance {Yves}
content:
I need to match this font, any help is appreciated! thanks...

| --- | --- |
| [super.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021222950/http:/typophile.com/files/super.jpg) | 5.56 KB |
author: foss

comments.content: That's [Jeremy Tankard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021222950/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jeremy%20Tankard)'s experiment in monocase type design, [FF Disturbance Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021222950/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.6621.2.6&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=supeomes&sampleSize=48), squooshed.
